home.title: Turning past data into the future I build.
home.subtitle: Hello, I'm Abel Kouadio, Data Scientist & Software Engineer
home.description: Passionate about data, I combine the descriptive analysis of a Data Analyst with the predictive power of a Data Scientist. I explore, clean, and interpret data to extract insights, then design machine learning models capable of turning this information into concrete solutions.
home.goal: My goal: helping companies understand their present and anticipate their future.

about.status: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Engineer
about.profil: Motivated and passionate about data science and AI, I have acquired solid experience in computer science and electronics during my internships. I have developed strong skills in data analysis and software development, which I want to put at the service of an ambitious company. My academic background has allowed me to master the fundamental concepts of data science and I am ready to take on new challenges. I am quickly operational and I am certain that I can make a significant contribution to your team and live up to the trust that will be placed in me.

experienceData.title: Data Science/AI & Full Stack Development Internship
experienceData.description: Design of a data collection system aimed at optimizing the recruitment of engineers and their placement with clients.
details: Development of an interactive dashboard allowing HR teams to monitor key KPIs in real-time (consultants on mission, pending CVs...), improving decision-making.
Integration of an OCR module to automatically extract information from CVs, reducing manual entry and associated errors.
Design and training of an NLP model (SpaCy) for intelligent data extraction (name, skills, experiences...), facilitating candidate pre-selection.
Development of an interface for matching profiles and missions (profile/mission matching).
Contribution to Full Stack architecture (Spring Boot, MySQL), ensuring scalability and smooth integration with internal tools.

experienceData.title: Data Science AI Internship
experienceData.description: Development of a predictive model based on machine learning algorithms for customer credit granting.
details: Data collection, cleaning, transformation and modeling
Exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify the most discriminating variables in customer risk prediction.
Design, training and evaluation of several models (logistic regression, decision trees, KNN), with performance comparison to select the most relevant one.
Development of a web application with user interface, facilitating access to predictions for non-technical teams.

experienceData.title: Web Development Freelance
experienceData.description: Development of an operational website for the SMSD organization, from design to production.
details: Participation in the analysis of functional and technical needs of the organization.
Development of the site architecture, key features, and user interface integration.
Coordination and management of development team tasks (work distribution, progress monitoring, synchronization meetings).
Testing, debugging, and continuous improvement of the site based on user feedback

experienceData.title: Full Stack Developer Internship
experienceData.description: Development of an intelligent hydroponic greenhouse management system
details: Design of an interactive user interface (dashboard) for real-time monitoring of key parameters (temperature, humidity, pH, EC).

Results: 30% reduction in water consumption compared to manual management. 25% improvement in yield per m² thanks to optimization of growing conditions. Automation rate: more than 80% of routine actions managed without human intervention.

educationData.degree: State Engineer in Digital with specialization in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
educationData.institution: ENSAM : National School of Arts and Crafts
educationData.description: In-depth training in computer science, focused on data science and artificial intelligence, covering data analysis, machine learning and innovative technologies to solve complex problems

educationData.institution: ESTEM : Higher School of Information Engineering, Telecommunications, Management & Civil Engineering
educationData.description: MP scientific preparatory class offering a solid foundation in mathematics, physics and probabilities, effectively preparing for studies in computer science, data science and artificial intelligence.

educationData.institution: Félix Houphouët Boigny Scientific High School
educationData.description: Mathematics training with focus on practical applications and modeling, Scientific Baccalaureate providing solid training in fundamental sciences and mathematics, developing rigor, analytical thinking and reasoning abilities.

projects.projectsContent: Here, you’ll find a selection of my personal and professional projects: Data Science, AI, full-stack web development, and tools. Click on “See more” to explore the technical details, features, and implementation choices.
projects.pOne: Click on the source code to view the files related to the project.
projects.pTwo: Once on GitHub, check the README.md file for more information.

projectsData.title: Intelligent CV Processing and Analysis System
projectsData.shortDescription: Profile/mission matching using NLP and information extraction.
longDescription: Objective: design an automated CV analysis solution by combining computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and a backend application with Spring Boot.
Information extraction system from CVs (OCR + NLP) and smart matching between profiles and client needs. Dashboard with HR KPIs and advanced filters.
features: Automated CV collection via upload or integration with an existing database
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to convert scanned CVs into usable text
Smart information extraction (name, email, skills, experience, education) using NLP (SpaCy)
Anonymization of personal data to ensure candidate confidentiality
Search and filtering engine for CVs and candidates
Interactive dashboard displaying key HR KPIs

projectsData.title: Credit Scoring ML
projectsData.shortDescription: Credit scoring model with a complete ML pipeline and FastAPI deployment.
longDescription: This project aims to build a machine learning model capable of predicting whether a loan applicant is likely to repay their loan or not. The goal is to help financial institutions make informed credit-granting decisions and reduce the risk of defaults.
It is a full data science project covering data cleaning, EDA, data preparation, model training (logistic regression, decision trees, KNN), and evaluation.
Deployment of a prediction API (FastAPI) with a simplified web interface.
features: Interactive form to input client information
Responsive design adapted to all devices

projectsData.title: This Portfolio!
projectsData.shortDescription: Modern portfolio with Framer Motion animations and Tailwind CSS.
longDescription: Modern and responsive personal portfolio, designed mobile-first to provide a smooth user experience across all devices. The site includes animated and interactive sections, dynamic cards, and reusable components to ensure modularity and visual consistency.
Developed with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, applying best practices for accessibility and performance.
The goal is to showcase my skills in web development and data science through an elegant and optimized interface.
features: Integration of icons and charts to illustrate skills and projects (React Icons, Recharts)

projectsData.title: Applied Data Science in Real Estate
projectsData.shortDescription: Development of a Machine Learning model to predict house prices based on their characteristics (size, location, number of rooms, etc.)
longDescription: This project involved designing and training a Machine Learning model for house price estimation.
The approach is based on analyzing real estate data, including key features such as surface area, number of rooms, geographical location, and other market-influencing variables.
The work included data preparation and cleaning, statistical exploration, relevant feature selection, as well as building regression models (linear regression, decision trees, random forests, etc.).

Performance was evaluated using suitable metrics (RMSE, MAE, R²). The goal is to provide a decision-support tool that helps anticipate the value of a property and better understand the factors driving its price.

projectsData.title: Python Data Analysis Projects
projectsData.shortDescription: Collection of data analysis projects carried out with Python and Pandas
longDescription: This project gathers several data analyses performed with Python, mainly using the Pandas library, along with NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn when needed.
Each study illustrates a specific data analysis problem: data cleaning and preparation, statistical exploration, graphical visualization.
The objective is to put fundamental data science tools into practice while building a collection of concrete and reusable examples, demonstrating rigor, curiosity, and analytical mindset.

projectsData.title: Power BI Dashboards
projectsData.shortDescription: Collection of interactive dashboards created with Power BI
longDescription: This project compiles several dashboards developed with Power BI, showcasing interactive and visual data analysis on various datasets.
Each dashboard enables exploration of key KPIs, filtering and segmentation of information, and presenting insights in a clear and intuitive way.
The objective is to demonstrate the ability to transform raw data into decision-oriented visualizations by applying best practices in design and interactivity specific to business intelligence tools.
